edu.uni.GAApplication
Class IndividualHolder

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.uni.GAApplication.IndividualHolder
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class IndividualHolder
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

A wrapper class used for storage and universal inter-class parameter passing of the GAIndividual object.

This class is used to associate a fitness with a GAIndividual object.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Pat Burke, Ryan Dixon, Jake Good, Jayapal Prabakaran
See Also:
